Title: Limits the transport of an arrested, detained or apprehended person in an unmarked police vehicle or concealed identity police vehicle
Summary: Prohibits the transport of a person in an unmarked police vehicle or concealed identity police vehicle after being arrested, detained or apprehended by a police officer or peace officer who is not wearing his or her uniform unless an officer in uniform is present for the duration of the transport; prohibits stops and searches by a police officer or peace officer who is not wearing his or her uniform using an unmarked police vehicle or a concealed identity police vehicle unless an officer in uniform is present for the duration of the stop and search.
LawCode: Add ยง73-a, Civ Rts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil rights law, in relation to limiting the transport of an arrested, detained or apprehended person in an unmarked police vehicle or concealed identity police vehicle and the use of such vehicles for stops and searches
